thread.title: Mark Ritchie
thread.title_full: Defender Bird Spikes reviewed by Mark Ritchie

author: Mark Ritchie
title: Mark Ritchie
text: I bought a quantity of bird spikes for window ledges and horizontal pipework on the side of my house. I found the website easy to use and it was straightforward to find exactly what I wanted. Delivery was quick, and installation was very straightforward, especially helped with the support information which came with the product.
